definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: Can non-national public servants commit the bribery crime?
sentences.chinese: 非国家工作人员可否构成受贿罪共犯？

sentences.english: Offenses involving the provision of Renminbi funds with the knowledge of fraudulent purchase of foreign exchange shall be punished as an accomplice.
sentences.chinese: 明知用于骗购外汇而提供人民币资金的，以共犯论处。

sentences.english: So, it is necessary to re - construct our country's foundation of accomplices' punishment theory in criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要重构我国刑法学共犯的处罚根据理论。

sentences.english: Park is the first sitting president of South Korea to be accused by prosecutors of a criminal conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 朴槿惠是韩国首位被检方指控为共犯的在任总统。

sentences.english: He was an accomplice with Bugotu in the bank robbery.
sentences.chinese: 在抢劫银行一案中他是布戈图的共犯。

sentences.english: Secondly, the thesis studies the accomplice problem of traffic accident guilty, explains if the common unintentional crime will be established.
sentences.chinese: 论文第五章对交通肇事罪的自首与共犯进行研究。

sentences.english: Including recidivism and the accomplice, deep origin has this explanation.
sentences.chinese: 这说明连累犯与共犯有着深厚的渊源。

sentences.english: Finally, this article establishes rules of punishment for the complicity relation departure.
sentences.chinese: 文章最后为共犯关系的脱离者设立了罚则。

sentences.english: Whoever conspires with the persons listed in the preceding two paragraphs to engage in embezzlement shall be punished as an accomplice in the crime.
sentences.chinese: 与前两款所列人员勾结，伙同贪污的，以共犯论处。

sentences.english: At the same time, this paper proves that how to affirm the criminal amount of the complicities of bribery.
sentences.chinese: 同时，本文还论证了受贿罪共犯的犯罪数额如何认定。

sentences.english: The reduction behavior should be one of the surplus circumstances of joint crime.
sentences.chinese: 共同犯罪中的实行减少，应是共犯过限的情形之一。

sentences.english: The non-national staff members can become the accomplice in bribery crime .
sentences.chinese: 非国家工作人员能够成为受贿罪共犯。

sentences.english: Whoever provides the RMB capital knowingly for the purchase of foreign currency by deceitful means shall be dealt with as an accomplice.
sentences.chinese: 明知用于骗购外汇而提供人民币资金的，以共犯论处。

sentences.english: Two accomplices of them were each sentenced 19 years in jail, said the report.
sentences.chinese: 报道还提及，两名共犯被判处有期徒刑19年。

sentences.english: For this purpose, can only fix position committing a crime in relative with the accomplice single-handed including recidivism.
sentences.chinese: 为此，连累犯只能定位于和共犯相对的单独犯罪。

sentences.english: Eniseitige Teilnahme is an issue to be researched in criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 片面共犯是刑法中值得研究的问题。

definition: to conspire with sb/to plot/a conspirator/a partner in crime/an accomplice
see 過失致死罪|过失致死罪[guo4 shi1 zhi4 si3 zui4]
to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
